net.sf.ehcache.config
Enum TerracottaConfiguration.ValueMode

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<TerracottaConfiguration.ValueMode>
      net.sf.ehcache.config.TerracottaConfiguration.ValueMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TerracottaConfiguration.ValueMode>
Enclosing class:
TerracottaConfiguration
public static enum TerracottaConfiguration.ValueMode
extends java.lang.Enum<TerracottaConfiguration.ValueMode>

Represents whether values are stored with serialization in the clustered store or through Terracotta clustered identity.

Author:
amiller

Enum Constant Summary
IDENTITY
          Use Terracotta clustered identity to preserve object identity without serialization
SERIALIZATION
          When a key or value is put in the cache, serialize the data for sending around the cluster
